AbilityBonusOption.Description:
This faction starts with the Civics technology, which allows them to construct Inns and Bell Towers.
Unlocks the Civic Center improvement which increases construction efficiency and reduces Unrest. A Civic Center can only be build in Towns.

GameModifier.Provides: Unlocks the Civic Center improvement which increases construction efficiency and reduces Unrest. A Civic Center can only be build in Towns.

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
Razing a city transfers half that city's population to your capital. When men or fallen are defeated in combat they are transferred as population to your nearest city.
Unlocks the Labor Camp improvement which increases production in the city.

GameModifier.Provides: Unlocks the Labor Camp improvement which increases production in the city

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
Faction starts with the Training technology, allowing them to construct Barracks.
50% reduction in construction costs for the Training Yard line of improvements.

GameModifier.Provides: May pass through Hills terrain without any penalty

AbilityBonusOption.Description: Faction starts with the Shard Harvesting technology, which allows them to construct Shard Altars. The player also starts with an additional 40 Mana and has a 10% bonus to Mana production.

GameModifier.Provides: +10% Mana production

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
Unlocks Throwing Axes and one handed axes.
Unlocks the War Hall Improvement.

GameModifier.Provides: Unlocks Throwing Axes (available once Weaponry is researched) and one handed axes
Unlocks the War Hall Improvement which all units trained in a city the Raider trait

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
Unlocks Frostbound weapons (Axe, Battle Axe, Spear, Mace, Dagger, Longsword) that cause cold damage and slow the target when struck.
Unlocks Lands of Ice, a spell which transforms land into arctic terrain.
Units move at double normal rate over Arctic terrain.
This faction can build Snow Giant Camp improvements on Snow Giant Lair resources allowing them to recruit Snow Giants.

GameModifier.Provides: Unlocks Frostbound weapons (Axe, Battle Axe, Spear, Mace, Dagger, Longsword) that cause cold damage and slow the target when struck

Unlocks the City of Snow and Ice improvement, which improves a city's defenses by providing defending units, gives an Initiative bonus to all City Defenders, and spawns a Mirror Elemental (requires Sorcery Tech).
Unlocks the Civic Center improvement which increases construction efficiency and reduces Unrest. A Civic Center can only be build in Towns.
Unlocks Lands of Ice, a spell which transforms land into arctic terrain
Units move at double normal rate over Arctic terrain
This faction can build Snow Giant Camp improvements on Snow Giant Lair resources allowing them to recruit Snow Giants
This faction cannot build Hedge Walls, Stone Walls, Fort or Castle improvement.

AbilityBonusOption.Description: Unlocks the Polearms line of weapons that can both Impale and Cleave the enemy: the War Scythe, Voulge, Halberd and Burning Halberd.

GameModifier.Provides: Unlocks the Polearms line of weapons that can both Impale and Cleave the enemy: the War Scythe, Voulge, Halberd and Burning Halberd

AbilityBonusOption.Description: Unlocks dual wield Dagger, Shortsword, Scimitar and Ice Scimitar.

GameModifier.Provides: Unlocks dual wield Dagger, Shortsword, Scimitar and Ice Scimitar

AbilityBonusOption.Description: Unlocks the Heavy Staff, Pole Axe, Bastard Sword and Greatsword.

GameModifier.Provides: Unlocks the Heavy Staff, Pole Axe, Bastard Sword and Greatsword

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
Unlocks Assassinate, a spell that targets an enemy champion on the strategic map causing 0, 50% or 100% hit points damage at random.
Unlocks the Guild Assassin, a unit that can utilise a number of special attacks in combat.

GameModifier.Provides: Unlocks Assassinate, a spell that targets an enemy champion on the strategic map causing 0, 50% or 100% hit points damage at random
Unlocks the Guild Assassin, a unit that can utilise a number of special attacks in combat

AbilityBonusOption.Description: Monuments, Guardian Statue and Guardian Idol improvements provide spell resistance for defending units, and a fame increase.

GameModifier.Provides: Monuments, Guardian Statue and Guardian Idol improvements provide spell resistance for defending units, and a fame increase.

AbilityBonusOption.Description: This faction can train Sand, Stone, Crystal, Obsidian and War Golems in their cities.

GameModifier.Provides: This faction can train Sand, Stone, Crystal, Obsidian and War Golems in their cities

AbilityBonusOption.Description: This faction can train Air, Earth, Fire and Water Shrill in their cities.

GameModifier.Provides: This faction can train Air, Earth, Fire and Water Shrill in their cities

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
This faction starts with the Manipulation technology which allows them to use the Underhand Deal treaty to increase revenue, and to trade Fame as a commodity.
Unlocks Insurrection, a spell which increases unrest in an enemy city (costs gold to cast).

GameModifier.Provides: This faction starts with the Manipulation technology which allows them to use the Underhand Deal treaty to increase revenue, and to trade Fame as a commodity
Unlocks Insurrection, a spell which increases unrest in an enemy city (costs gold to cast)

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
The faction gets a +50% crystal production bonus.
Crystal Quarry, Mine and Trove produce mana and provide an Ophidian.
Unlocks Crystallization, a spell which converts a shard in your empire into a crystal crag.

GameModifier.Provides: The faction gets a +50% crystal production bonus
Crystal Quarry, Mine and Trove produce mana and provide an Ophidian
Unlocks Crystallization, a spell which converts a shard in your empire into a crystal crag

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
The faction receives gildar revenue from the Alchemy line of Improvements, as well as 50% reduction in labour cost for their construction.
Unlocks Hellfire Bombs and the Grenadier unit.
Unlocks Potion of Vigour.
Unlocks Alchemy, a spell that converts 100 mana into 100 gildar.

GameModifier.Provides: The faction receives gildar revenue from the Alchemy line of Improvements, as well as 50% reduction in labour cost for their construction
Unlocks Hellfire Bombs and the Grenadier unit
Unlocks Potion of Vigour
Unlocks Alchemy, a spell that converts 100 mana into 100 gildar

AbilityBonusOption.Description: The faction gets +5% Research, and all units are +10% Accuracy.

GameModifier.Provides: The faction gets +5% Research
All units are +10% to Accuracy

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
This faction can build Young Ogre Pits, Ogre Pits and Bone Ogre Pits in their cities which automatically produce free Young Ogre, Ogre or Bone Ogre units.
Ogre Camp's (built on Ogre Lairs) do not require the Wildland Allies tech and do not cost gildar to build. Bone Ogre Camps do not require gildar to build.

GameModifier.Provides: This faction can build Young Ogre Pits, Ogre Pits and Bone Ogre Pits in their cities which automatically produce free Young Ogre, Ogre or Bone Ogre units.
Ogre Camps (built on Ogre Lairs) do not require the Wildland Allies tech and do not cost gildar to build. Bone Ogre Camps do not require gildar to build.

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
This faction can train various Darkling units.
Can recruit Darkling Shaman (Mage henchmen) once Cooperation is researched.

GameModifier.Provides:
This faction can train various Darkling units. Darkling units do not require wages.
Can recruit Darkling Shaman (Mage henchmen) once Cooperation is researched.

AbilityBonusOption.Description: This faction can build Troll Pits in their cities, allowing them to train Trolls, Troll Warriors and Troll Shamans (henchmen units).

GameModifier.Provides: This faction can build Troll Pits in their cities which automatically produce free Troll units.
This faction can train Troll Shaman (Mage henchmen) units in their cities once Cooperation is researched.

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
Unlocks War Boar mounts, and the Boar Yard improvement which produces War Boars.
Does not use Horse mounts, instead Stables provide an additional source of Food.
This faction gains a Taurgol from Beast Altars.

GameModifier.Provides: Unlocks War Boar mounts, and the Boar Yard improvement which produces War Boars
Does not use Horse mounts, instead Stables provide an additional source of Food
This faction gains a Taurgol from Beast Altars

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
Bell Tower improvement grants +1 City Defender Group. Town Hall improvement grants +2 City Defender Groups. Palace improvement grants +3 City Defender Groups.
Units defending cities get +20% to Attack and +20% to Defense.
-5% Unrest.

GameModifier.Provides: Bell Tower improvement grants +1 City Defender Group. Town Hall improvement grants +2 City Defender Groups. Palace improvement grants +3 City Defender Groups.
Units defending cities get +20% to Attack.
Units defending cities get +20% to Defense.
-5% Unrest.

AbilityBonusOption.Description: Faction can build Walls, Training Yard, Barracks, Forge and Catapult Tower improvements in Conclaves

GameModifier.Provides: Faction can build Walls, Training Yard, Barracks, Forge and Catapult Tower improvements in Conclaves

AbilityBonusOption.Description: Faction can build Fort (Kingdom), Castle (Empire), Training Yard, Barracks, Forge and Catapult Tower improvements in Towns.

GameModifier.Provides: Faction can build Fort (Kingdom), Castle (Empire), Training Yard, Barracks, Forge and Catapult Tower improvements in Towns

AbilityBonusOption.Description: Unlocks the Firestone Forge, Firestone Tower and Firestone Castle improvements.

GameModifier.Provides: Unlocks the Firestone Forge, Firestone Tower and Firestone Castle improvements

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
This faction receives a 50% reduction in labour cost for the Market and Merchant improvements.
Double value when selling in shops.
Unlocks Acquire Metal, a spell which converts 100 Gildar into 10 Metal.
Unlocks Acquire Crystal, a spell which converts 100 Gildar into 10 Crystal.

GameModifier.Provides: This faction receives a 50% reduction in labour cost for the Market and Merchant improvements
Double value when selling in shops
Unlocks Acquire Metal, a spell which converts 100 Gildar into 10 Metal
Unlocks Acquire Crystal, a spell which converts 100 Gildar into 10 Crystal

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
Unlocks Horse Market improvement (produce Horses).
Stables (built on Wild Horse resources) grant +1 Material in the nearest city.

GameModifier.Provides: Unlocks Horse Market improvement (produce Horses)
Stables (built on Wild Horse resources) grant +1 Material in the nearest city

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
Unlocks Wizards Eye, a spell which summons a Wizard Eye scout unit anywhere on the strategic map.
Unlocks the Wizards Tower which grants +5 Spell Mastery and Spell Resistance for Trained Units, +1 Essense in the city, and auto summons a defending Mage unit when the city is attacked. A Wizards Tower can only be built in Conclaves.
Workshop, Mason, Mill, Labor Guild and Slave Pen improvements produce +1 Production per Essence in the city.
Unlocks spells that allow Champions to aquire (Adept level) proficiency in new spell schools.
Unlocks the Staff Mastery unit design trait (+3 Initiative when using a ranged staff).

GameModifier.Provides: Unlocks Wizards Eye, a spell which summons a Wizard Eye scout unit anywhere on the strategic map

Unlocks the Wizards Tower which grants +5 Spell Mastery and Spell Resistance for Trained Units, +1 Essense in the city, and auto summons a defending Mage unit when the city is attacked (can only be built in Conclaves)
Workshop, Mason, Mill, Labor Guild and Slave Pen improvements produce +1 Production per Essence in the city
Unlocks spells that allow Champions to aquire (Adept level) proficiency in new spell schools
Unlocks the Staff Mastery unit design trait (+3 Initiative when using a ranged staff)

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
50% reduction in labour cost for the Sage, Cloister, Library and Great Archive improvements.
Ancient Temple (built on temple ruins) provides +1 Fame per season and double the normal Research bonus.
Construction of a Library, Great Archive or Ancient Temple improvement spawns a quest nearby.
All units have a +5% chance to find better items from goodie huts.

GameModifier.Provides: 50% reduction in labour cost for the Sage, Cloister, Library and Great Archive improvements
Ancient Temple (built on temple ruins) provides +1 Fame per season and double the normal Research bonus
Construction of a Library, Great Archive or Ancient Temple improvement spawns a quest nearby
All units have a +5% chance to find better items from goodie huts

AbilityBonusOption.Description: Unlocks the Summoning Gate improvement which grants +1 Summon Pool per Essence.

GameModifier.Provides: Unlocks the Summoning Gate improvement which grants +1 Summon Pool per Essence.

AbilityBonusOption.Description: Faction starts with +2 army size

GameModifier.Provides: Faction starts with +2 army size

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
Units defending cities get +10% per city level to Defense due to strengthened city defenses.
Unlocks the Light Catapult (requires Longbows technology) and the Destroyer Catapult (requires Siege Weapons technology).
Unlocks the Light Crossbow - a basic crossbow that does not require metal to produce, and Masterwork Crossbows that are more accurate and fire faster than standard crossbows.

GameModifier.Provides: Units defending cities get +10% per city level to Defense due to strengthened city defenses
Unlocks the Light Catapult (requires Longbows technology) and the Destroyer Catapult (requires Siege Weapons technology)
Unlocks the Light Crossbow - a basic crossbow that does not require metal to produce, and Masterwork Crossbows that hit harder and fire faster than standard crossbows

AbilityBonusOption.Description: This factions Tower of Dominion provides an additional +2 Growth, +1 Zone of Control, +1 Essence, -10% Unrest, and an extra unit of City Defenders and Archers.

GameModifier.Provides: This factions Tower of Dominion provides an additional +2 Growth, +1 Zone of Control, +1 Essence, -10% Unrest, and an extra unit of City Defenders and Archers.

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
Unlocks the Vigilant Watchtower improvement which provides +1 zone of control and increases initiative of defending units on the first turn of combat.
Unlocks the Vigilant Watch outpost upgrade (replaces the High Tower) which provides +1 zone of control and an additional +1 Sight Range around the outpost, and increases initiative on the first turn of combat to friendly units in Zone of Control.
Unlocks the Enmity vs Twisted and Prepared unit design traits.

GameModifier.Provides: Unlocks the Vigilant Watchtower improvement which provides +1 zone of control and increases initiative of defending units on the first turn of combat

Unlocks the Vigilant Watch outpost upgrade (replaces the High Tower) which provides +1 zone of control and an additional +1 Sight Range around the outpost, and increases initiative on the first turn of combat to friendly units in Zone of Control
Unlocks the Enmity vs Twisted and Prepared unit design traits

AbilityBonusOption.Description: Unlocks the Border House outpost upgrade, which increases the attack, defense and movement of friendly units in the outpost's borders, and provides a free unit of Border Guard.

GameModifier.Provides: Unlocks the Border House outpost upgrade, which increases the attack, defense and movement of friendly units in the outpost's borders, and provides a free unit of Border Guard

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
50% Reduction in training time for units.
25% Reduction in training time for weapons and armor.

GameModifier.Provides: -50% Training time for units
-25% Production cost for weapons and armor

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
Unlocks the Tower of Arcana, a unique improvement that generates Arcana which can be used to cast strategic spells (requires Rituals technology). It also increases the city Essence yield, and spawns a Mage unit to help defend the city when attacked.
Unlocks Arcane Outpost, a spell which places an outpost (requires Arcana to cast).
Unlocks Arcane Riftwalk, a spell which teleports the caster, and their army, to a tile in friendly territory (requires Arcana to cast).
Unlocks Arcane Tempest, a spell which inflicts lightning damage on an enemy army in friendly territory (requires Arcana to cast).

GameModifier.Provides: Unlocks the Tower of Arcana, a unique improvement that generates Arcana which an be used to cast strategic spells. It also increases the city Essence yield, and spawns a Mage unit to help defend the city when attacked.
Unlocks Arcane Outpost, a spell which places an outpost (requires Arcana to cast)
Unlocks Arcane Riftwalk, a spell which teleports the caster, and their army, to a tile in friendly territory (requires Arcana to cast)
Unlocks Arcane Tempest, a spell which inflicts lightning damage on an enemy army in friendly territory (requires Arcana to cast)

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
This faction gains an additional +1 Mana and Crow Demons from air shard shrines.
+1 Bonus level for all Air magic summons.
Unlocks Tome of the Wind which allow the reader to learn Air magic.
!WARNING! ::: Do not combine w/ Gravetouched ::: Do not combine w/ Mediums ::: Do not combine w/ Reanimation Ritual ::: Cannot be used w/ Other Air/Earth/Fire/Water/etc. Adepts

+1 Bonus level for all Air magic summons

This faction gains an additional +1 Mana, and Grave Elementals from Earth Shard shrines.
+1 Bonus level for all Earth magic summons.
Unlocks Tome of the Mountain which allow the reader to learn Earth magic.
!WARNING! ::: Do not combine w/ Gravetouched ::: Do not combine w/ Mediums ::: Do not combine w/ Reanimation Ritual ::: Cannot be used w/ Other Air/Earth/Fire/Water/etc. Adepts

!WARNING! ::: Do not combine w/ Gravetouched ::: Do not combine w/ Mediums ::: Do not combine w/ Reanimation Ritual ::: Cannot be used w/ Other Air/Earth/Fire/Water/etc. Adepts

!WARNING! ::: Do not combine w/ Gravetouched ::: Do not combine w/ Mediums ::: Do not combine w/ Reanimation Ritual ::: Cannot be used w/ Other Air/Earth/Fire/Water/etc. Adepts

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
This faction gains an additional +1 Mana, and Death magic summons from Death Shard shrines.
+1 Bonus level for all Death magic summons.
Unlocks Tome of the Styx which allow the reader to learn Death magic.
For Kingdoms, one Flooded Graveyard is allowed.
!WARNING! ::: Do not combine w/ Gravetouched ::: Do not combine w/ Mediums ::: Do not combine w/ Reanimation Ritual ::: Cannot be used w/ Other Air/Earth/Fire/Water/etc. Adepts

For Kingdoms, one Flooded Graveyard is allowed

::: Do not combine w/ Gravetouched ::: Do not combine w/ Mediums ::: Do not combine w/ Reanimation Ritual ::: Cannot be used w/ Other Air/Earth/Fire/Water/etc. Adepts

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
This faction gains an additional +1 Mana, and Sentinels from Life Shard shrines.
+1 Bonus level for all Life magic summons.
Unlocks Tome of the Sun which allow the reader to learn Life magic.
For Empires, one Iru T'Alavar is allowed.
!WARNING! ::: Do not combine w/ Gravetouched ::: Do not combine w/ Mediums ::: Do not combine w/ Reanimation Ritual ::: Do not combine w/ Great Fortresses ::: Cannot be used w/ Other Air/Earth/Fire/Water/etc. Adepts

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
Unlocks Shrines and Temples to the Old Gods - Arvos, Hadollon and Lialdir, that provide unique bonuses to the city in which they are constructed.
Blocks access to the spells Holy War, Luminous Perception (Kingdom), Baleful Surge (Empire), Sanguine Wish (Empire), Malevolent Endeavor (Empire).
This faction cannot train Disciple units.

GameModifier.Provides: Unlocks Shrines and Temples to the Old Gods - Arvos, Hadollon and Lialdir, that provide unique bonuses to the city in which they are constructed
Blocks access to the spells Holy War, Luminous Perception (Kingdom), Baleful Surge (Empire), Sanguine Wish (Empire), Malevolent Endeavor (Empire)
This faction cannot train Disciple units

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
Unlocks Divine Crusade (Kingdom) or Infernal Crusade (Empire), world spells that boost all units movement, initiative and resilience.
-5% Unrest.
+10% bonus to the amount of healing done by spells.
Unlocks the Templar unit (a Disciple that can wear armor) replacing the Disciple.

GameModifier.Provides: Unlocks Divine Crusade (Kingdom) or Infernal Crusade (Empire), world spells that boost all units movement, initiative and resilience
-5% Unrest
+10% bonus to the amount of healing done by spells.
Unlocks the Templar unit (a Disciple that can wear armor) replacing the Disciple

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
Unlocks the Sky Sanctum improvement, which creates an Air Shard within 3 tiles of the city in which it is built, and also boosts defending units initiative.
Unlocks the Acolyte unit (replaces the Disciple).

GameModifier.Provides: Unlocks the Sky Sanctum improvement, which creates an Air Shard within 3 tiles of the city in which it is built, and also boosts defending units initiative
Unlocks the Acolyte unit (replaces the Disciple)

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
Unlocks the Hallowed Stone improvement, which creates an Earth Shard within 3 tiles of the city in which it is built, and also boosts defending units hit points.
Unlocks the Acolyte unit (replaces the Disciple).

GameModifier.Provides: Unlocks the Hallowed Stone improvement, which creates an Earth Shard within 3 tiles of the city in which it is built, and also boosts defending units hit points
Unlocks the Acolyte unit (replaces the Disciple)

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
Unlocks the Sacred Flame improvement, which creates a Fire Shard within 3 tiles of the city in which it is built, and also boosts defending units fire attack.
Unlocks the Acolyte unit (replaces the Disciple).

GameModifier.Provides: Unlocks the Sacred Flame improvement, which creates a Fire Shard within 3 tiles of the city in which it is built, and also boosts defending units fire attack
Unlocks the Acolyte unit (replaces the Disciple)

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
Unlocks the Spirit Pool improvement, which creates a Water Shard within 3 tiles of the city in which it is built, and also boosts defending units dodge.
Unlocks the Acolyte unit (replaces the Disciple).

GameModifier.Provides: Unlocks the Spirit Pool improvement, which creates a Water Shard within 3 tiles of the city in which it is built, and also boosts defending units dodge
Unlocks the Acolyte unit (replaces the Disciple)

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
May pass through Forest terrain without any penalty.
Unlocks the Tree Shrine improvement, which reduces Unrest and creates a Forest Grove near the city in which it is built.
Unlocks Construct Menhir, a spell which places a Menhir on the map (extends your Zone of Control, and boosts spell resistance of friendly units in Zone of Control).
Unlocks the Stone Circle outpost upgrade, which produces mana, and increases health regeneration of friendly units in the outpost's borders (may not build any other outpost upgrades).
This faction can build Treekin Home improvements on Treekin Grove resources allowing them to recruit Treekin Giants, and the Sprite Camp improvement on Mushroom Grove resources allowing them to recruit Sprites.
May not build Logging Camps, Lumber Yard or Timber Mills.
Unlocks Druidic Meditation, a spell that produces +1 Mana per Grain in the enchanted city.
Unlocks Natures Blessing, a spell that provides +20 Food per Grain and -10% Unrest in all your cities.
Unlocks Protection of Hurnol, a spell that grants all faction units +20% Defense and +20% Magic Resistance, and disciple units +5 health regeneration per turn in tactical battle.
Unlocks the Druid unit (replaces Disciple).

GameModifier.Provides: May pass through Forest terrain without any penalty
Unlocks the Tree Shrine improvement, which reduces Unrest and creates a Forest Grove near the city in which it is built
Unlocks Construct Menhir, a spell which places a Menhir on the map (extends your Zone of Control, and boosts spell resistance of friendly units in Zone of Control)
Unlocks the Stone Circle outpost upgrade, which produces mana, and increases health regeneration of friendly units in the outpost's borders (may not build any other outpost upgrades)

This faction can build Treekin Home improvements on Treekin Grove resources allowing them to recruit Treekin Giants, and the Sprite Camp improvement on Mushroom Grove resources allowing them to recruit Sprites
May not build Logging Camps, Lumber Yard or Timber Mills
Unlocks Druidic Meditation, a spell that produces +1 Mana per Grain in the enchanted city
Unlocks Natures Blessing, a spell that provides +20 Food per Grain and -10% Unrest in all your cities
Unlocks Protection of Hurnol, a spell that grants all faction units +20% Defense and +20% Magic Resistance, and disciple units +5 health regeneration per turn in tactical battle
Blocks access to the spells Holy War, Luminous Perception (Kingdom), Baleful Surge (Empire), Sanguine Wish (Empire), Malevolent Endeavor (Empire)
Unlocks the Druid unit (replaces Disciple)

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
Unlocks Totems, special improvements that reduce Unrest, generate Faith, and provide unique bonuses to the city they are in (replace the Cleric line of improvements).
Unlocks Canticle of the Sun and Moon, a spell that reduces Unrest in all your cities, and increases Initiative of all faction units.
Blocks access to the spells Holy War, Luminous Perception (Kingdom), Baleful Surge (Empire), Sanguine Wish (Empire), Malevolent Endeavor (Empire).
Unlocks the Shepherd unit (replaces Disciple).

GameModifier.Provides: Unlocks Totems, special improvements that reduce Unrest, generate Faith, and provide unique bonuses to the city they are in (replace the Cleric line of improvements)
Unlocks Canticle of the Sun and Moon, a spell that reduces Unrest in all your cities, and increases Initiative of all faction units
Blocks access to the spells Holy War, Luminous Perception (Kingdom), Baleful Surge (Empire), Sanguine Wish (Empire), Malevolent Endeavor (Empire)
Unlocks the Shepherd unit (replaces Disciple)

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
Cleric line of improvements provide a Black Naja.
Unlocks the Hall of the Naja and Serpent Sanctorium improvements (special Temple improvements unique to the Serpent Court).
Unlocks Serpent's Persuasion, a spell that charms an enemy trained unit in friendly territory.
Unlocks Snake Plague, a spell that causes Unrest and reduces population in a target enemy city.
Unlocks the Initiate unit (replaces the Disciple).

GameModifier.Provides: Cleric line of improvements provide a Black Naja

Unlocks Serpent's Persuasion, a spell that charms an enemy trained unit in friendly territory
Unlocks Snake Plague, a spell that causes Unrest and reduces population in a target enemy city
Unlocks the Initiate unit (replaces the Disciple)

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
+1 Bonus level for all Demon summons.
Unlocks spells to summon Fiend, Scourge, Fury, Hellhound and Brimstone Demons.
Cleric line of improvements provide a Martyr unit.
Unlocks the Ritualist unit (replaces the Disciple).

GameModifier.Provides: +1 Bonus level for all Demon summons
Unlocks spells to summon Fiend, Scourge, Fury, Hellhound and Brimstone Demons.
Cleric line of improvements provide a Martyr unit
Unlocks the Ritualist unit (replaces the Disciple)

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
Unlocks Weaving, a spell that converts 150 Faith to 75 Mana (requires Arcance Mastery tech).
Blocks access to the spells Holy War, Luminous Perception (Kingdom), Baleful Surge (Empire), Sanguine Wish (Empire), Malevolent Endeavor (Empire).
Unlocks the Magus unit (replaces the Disciple).
Priest and Magus spells require Mana to cast rather than Faith.

GameModifier.Provides: Unlocks Weaving, a spell that converts 150 Faith to 75 Mana (requires Arcance Mastery tech)
Blocks access to the spells Holy War, Luminous Perception (Kingdom), Baleful Surge (Empire), Sanguine Wish (Empire), Malevolent Endeavor (Empire)
Unlocks the Magus unit (replaces the Disciple)

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
This faction can train Widows, Harridans and Hoarder spiders in their cities.
Unlocks Ravenous Harridan and Blood Harridan mounts, and the Harridan Den improvement which produces Harridan.
Does not use Horse mounts, instead Stables provide an additional source of food for Harridan, increasing faction Harridan production.
Unlocks the Cultist unit (replaces the Disciple).

GameModifier.Provides: Unlocks Ravenous Harridan and Blood Harridan mounts, and the Harridan Den improvement which produces Harridan
Does not use Horse mounts, instead Stables provide an additional source of food for Harridan, increasing faction Harridan production
Unlocks the Cultist unit (replaces the Disciple)

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
Unlocks Rage of Urgyrul, a spell that grants +1 Move and +50% Maul chance to target champions army.
Unlocks Reavers Pact, a spell that grants all Bloodline units +3 Initiative on the first turn of combat and heals 12 hit points when killing a unit in tactical battle.
Unlocks Rise of the Beast, a spell that provides +2 faction Beast Power, and +15% Growth in all your cities.
Blocks access to the spells Holy War, Luminous Perception (Kingdom), Baleful Surge (Empire), Sanguine Wish (Empire), Malevolent Endeavor (Empire).
Unlocks the Cabalist unit (replaces the Disciple).
